website_summaries.verdict: The Fluance AB40's sound base offers significant performance advantages over competitive sound bars, but you'll need a TV that fits on it.
pros: The Fluance AB40 delivers great sound for the money, outperforming many sound bars at the same price or more
cons: If you have a TV with feet on each end you won't be able to use this unit
The deep-set controls on the unit may also limit the placement of your TV

customer_reviews.title: Mine failed after 16 months, CLICK...CLICK...CLICK...
customer_reviews.text: Sound was OK, much better than TV's, and I was happy with it. Months ago I began to hear a loud 'CLICK' repeated every second, continuously, after using the unit for a few hours. Then after a hour of use it would start CLICKing. Now within seconds of turning it on. This happens an all sources, all volume levels, and the volume of the CLICKing is constant (loud) no matter what the audio volume. So now it's a unplugged expensive base only for my tv. Maybe someday i'll rip out it's internals except for the speakers and add my own amplifier, one that doesn't CLICK...CLICK...CLICK...CLICK...CLICK...CLICK...CLICK...CLICK...CLICK.........
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cortopassi

customer_reviews.title: Failed in less than 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: The Fluance AB40 sound base sounds great, but failed in under 4 months! After a short amount of time, the unit just turns itself off. To watch TV, I have to turn the unit back on again every few minutes. Reading other similar reviews, it would seem that the Fluance AB40 is very unreliable. Fluance want's the customer to pay shipping to have it repaired/replaced. This is a heavy unit and the shipping costs are sky high! I'm very disappointed and would never consider another Fluance product.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: FLAUNCE AB 40 HIGH PERFORMANCE SOUNDBASE TV SPEAKER WITH 3D SYSTEM AND SOUND ENHANCED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for my TV and I herd it was not very good. That is very wrong who wrote that. This speaker is great, I HAD THE BASE TURNED UP AND IT SHOOK MY PICTURES OFF THE WALL AND MY GLASS ON THE TABLE MOVED. After awhile you have this, it will automatically adjust itself. ( I GIVE THESE PEOPLE WHO INVENTED THIS SPEAKER 10 STARS, I USE IT ON DISH NETWORK AND IT WORKS EXCELLANT, THANK YOU ALL VERY MUCH FOR THIS SYSTEM. GOD BLESS EACH ONE OF YOU AND PETS TOO AND EVERYONE IN YOUR COMPANY. James D. North
customer_reviews.author: James D North

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but background whine
customer_reviews.text: Our first sound bar went bad so we got this one as a replacement. First thing I noticed is that our first sound bar had a visual display of how high the volume was, this does not. A minor annoyance. A bigger one is the background hum. It started very low, only audible if the TV was off or silent but it's started to increase to the point we can hear it during a quiet time in a show. EDIT and now after less than 2 years, it just died. It'll play sound for while, then go silent
customer_reviews.author: William Ogden

customer_reviews.title: A nice sounding unit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Cambridge Audio TV2(v2) and the Fluance AB 40. Cambridge device produced a sound that, well much better than tv speakers, was distant and hollow. The Fluance AB 40 is by far the better sounding speaker system. Also sounds better than a Sony sound plate I tried. And its not just great for movies and tv shows but also music. Put on Pandora, Spotify or whatever may be your preference, and pipe it to the Fluance AB 40 by optical cable or Bluetooth. Either way sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound -- fantastic value.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this product for about six weeks, I can easily recommend it. For the price, you'd be hard-pressed to find a better soundbar/soundbase on the market. It really does sound spectacular, with room-filling sound and excellent bass. I'm knocking off a star (actually, I'd only knock off half a star if you could) due to the remote, which I feel was poorly designed. Other than that, this soundbase delivers in spades. 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: itsmewallyz

customer_reviews.title: Started clicking after 11 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sound quality when it worked, but now has started clicking loudly. I'm not sure what I want to do about it...throw it away and get something that will last or just use the TV audio. The TV's audio is pretty bad, but I guess I can get use to it. I'd recommend not buying this unit. Edit: I threw the unit in the trash and bought a TaoTronics Three Equalizer Mode Audio Speaker. This unit is cheap and sounds better than the TV speakers, but not as good as the AB40 sounded when I first bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Davis

customer_reviews.title: If you wanna save space without sacrificing too much sound. This is the way!
customer_reviews.text: I have this is a larger 25x30 room with vaulted ceiling, and it fills the space with great sound! I replaced a traditional 5.1 system with this as the room layout wasn't very good for the speaker placements. I couldn't be happier! I bought a second one for the bedroom too!
customer_reviews.author: Craig G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Soundbase
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Black one last Christmas. I then ordered a Denon and Bose soundbase for my son's TV so he could have better sound for his PS4 Pro. They both failed within 2 months. So I ordered this one in Bamboo and he loves it since it works perfectly and the sound is precise and punchy.
customer_reviews.author: The Smart One

customer_reviews.title: lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: purchased this June '18 . in the last month it has developed a background buzzing sound. Extremely annoying. It will have to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lipkind

customer_reviews.title: Only had it for about two weeks but so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for about two weeks but so far has been everything I expected. Still getting accustomed to the controls. The only problem I have experienced is that I can't control it with my Directv remote -- they have no code for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is very good, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good, especially for the price. HDMI/ARC connectivity with CEC would give this unit 5+ stars. Also, this unit does not provide sound if my TV is using an antenna (HD or otherwise) as an input.
customer_reviews.author: Completely Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 18 months of low frequency use
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sounded great when it arrived, but after about 18 months, it started making a popping sound after being on for about 5 minutes. Sounds a bit like the power to system is intermittently being cut. I tried writing to Fluance to get some advice but even though they created a case id ( 061800) and said they would get back in 24 hours they never did. Very disappointed as I had this shipped to Australia after reading positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mehdi

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 18 months, now won't turn on. Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 18 months, now won't turn on. Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Pletten54

customer_reviews.title: Unit failed after having 1 year
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with this unit, but it has gone out after only owning it one year. We did not buy warranty so shame on us. Take your chances if you must.
customer_reviews.author: Ohsewfun

customer_reviews.title: Fluance AB40 Is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. Deep and rich sound. No need for a subwoofer. Clarity and separation of sound is terrific. This is an amazing value!
customer_reviews.author: dsmdavid

customer_reviews.title: Sound system beats the heck out of TV's sound system
customer_reviews.text: This Sound system really fills the room and it seems to be easier to understand people talking.
customer_reviews.author: jnandidl

customer_reviews.title: This AB40 really is " high performance " and doubles as a pretty awesome Bluetooth stereo
customer_reviews.text: I have a large surround sound system but needed something for my tv in a smaller room. This AB40 really is " high performance " and doubles as a pretty awesome Bluetooth stereo. Turned up high it over powers the room.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J Myette

customer_reviews.title: A must have for all flat tvs
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy. The difference between this and standard tv speakers is insane. I have a Sony 930D 65in and its fit is just perfect. I can hear the dialog! And dang that bass is sweet! Best $250 you will spend
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for only a few hours and i still can't believe my ears. I've only heard good things about the AB40 but i am amazed at the clarity and bass the thing produces.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! If you have a Sony tv this is ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! If you have a Sony tv this is the one you want. Sony tv’s have a center stand so the Fluance is perfect and the sound is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Lit Coach

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound but eventually failed.
customer_reviews.text: I guess mine lasted longer than the other reviewers, but after a year and half it began turning itself off. I've bought over a dozen speakers from Fluance and this is the first time I've had any issue. I'm not sure yet if it's worth paying shipping to have it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Winn

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: A great sounding product. My only complaint is that there is no volume indicator on the unit. A row or ring of LEDs would make it perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Perfect, just what we need to enhance our viewing and listening experience, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Good sound bar! I like that we can put the TV on it, and not have to take up extra real-estate!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice movie experience.
customer_reviews.text: Really makes a big difference.when watching a movie. Your can here so many more sounds. Really brings you into the movie. Sound just fills the room. I’m watching all my old movies again as it make the experience brand new, really enjoying it. Voice is clear also
customer_reviews.author: Bruce white

customer_reviews.title: Failing after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was great.. for a year. Now it shuts off randomly while in use. It doesn't matter if it's bluetooth or optical, it will just shut off. Sometimes its once a day. Sometimes it's every five minutes. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Travis E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for a couple of years and it’s perfectly adequate for my use. Good, clear sound and very simple setup. Best thing is it connects to tv with one cable. No a/v receiver or tangle of dozens of wires. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diamond in the Rough!
customer_reviews.text: Had the Fluance a couple weeks now. For the money it adds full sound, with a healthy bass to the terrible speakers on today's flat panel televisions.
customer_reviews.author: North Star

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Great bass!
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker I have ever bought. It’s amazing how much sound it puts out. Great sounding bass and surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Move the rear firing speakers to the front where the viewers are located.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, sounds nice. Remote control power button too small and poorly located.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson Citizen

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is a winner. The sound is incredible.So glad we bought it.And Fluence tech suport is knowledgeable and responsive
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Sound from heaven!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment. Replacing zvox 555 that just quit working. Buying from amazon much easier than from fluance. Bluetooth works great. Very satisfied. Great controls. Can not miss for the money.
customer_reviews.author: james p swanson

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for great sound in a single package
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for great sound in a single package, no additional sub woofer or satellite speakers, this is the one. You can only do better if you drop $700 on a Sonos. Sounds great for music or TV. Best $200 I've spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great and fills the space with high quality TV or movie sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Biznass

customer_reviews.title: The AB40 overall is a great piece of equipment - I am really enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: The AB40 overall is a great piece of equipment - I am really enjoying it ! I haven't experienced any problems to date. The only thing that I don't like that much is the remote control - a little sluggish turning the sound base on at times.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE E.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound but not equal to the Bose I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Scott

customer_reviews.title: Simple, good sound in 1 enclosure.
customer_reviews.text: Simple set-up, minimal wires, great sound for a single-enclosure speaker. Virtual surround sound is not the same as having true rear speakers, but for a single enclosure it does a good job. And since I'm downsizing, this works great & meets my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: kyle s

customer_reviews.title: Only a university remote can replace product remote
customer_reviews.text: Only a universal remote can replace product remote. Sound is good. Base is very impressive
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: great sound after the 10hr break-in period
customer_reviews.text: great sound after the 10hr break-in period.. well balanced. I just had the speaker for about 2 weeks and so far I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LLoz378

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Soundbase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I had another soundbase and wanted something better. I wanted a self-contained system. I did not want a soundbar with a separate sub woofer. I came upon this while searching online. Every review I read raved(Cnet, for example). Well, as an owner I can see why. It's fantastic. I have used it for sound for video games, movies, and with Google Audiocast. It has great sound for the price. I'm now looking into the other products Fluance makes. It is high quality, with great sound at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: all good not cheaply made like others but you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: all good not cheaply made like others but you have to pay more of course, sound a little to "bassy" for me but still good and fills the room works good as a nice base too if you have a single pedestal TV
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Rating is an average of sound (a 5; absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: Rating is an average of sound (a 5; absolutely awesome) and utility (1; cannot control volume with TV or cable remote; I contacted fluance and they acknowledged same). If they ever fix the utility shortcoming, I’ll buy at least two.
customer_reviews.author: Fair Shake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. I have 2 issues. 1 is your height dimensions are not accurate. They state the unit is 3.9 inches tall, however with the rubber feet it is more like 4.1. I built a shelf exactly 4 inches below my Tv and the unit did not fit. I had to take my TV off the wall and adjust the TV bracket so the unit would fit on the shelf. 2 is you should add a HDMI audio out because some TV's IE: Panasonic do not stream audio from the optical audio out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul DeLisle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, better for older model tv's since it can withstand more weight
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tagle

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great! Not controllable by other remotes.
customer_reviews.text: I like nearly everything about it, but was disappointed that I cannot control it with the remote that controls all of the other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Van

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This did not work. It cost me $59.15 to get it out of my home via UPS. Free Shipping?
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

product_meta.title: Fluance AB40W High Performance Soundbase TV Speaker System with 3D Surround Sound & Enhanced Bass Boost, Wide Angle Soundstage, Bluetooth aptX (Lucky Bamboo)
feature_bullets: Rivaling a 5.1 speaker system, designed for placement under your television providing high definition, room-filling cinema performance
Virtual 3D surround sound and wide dispersion angled drivers result in a wider soundstage for an immersive home theater experience
Enhanced Bass Boost results in deep, commanding bass for all of your movies, TV or music just as if there was a separate subwoofer in the room
Engineered wood cabinet is precision crafted and internally braced throughout to create a warm, distortion-free sound; Supports flat panel TVs up to 65"
Feature rich extras include Bluetooth AptX for wireless music streaming, three sound modes (3D, Bass Boost, Standard), remote control, touch controls, digital optical and 3.5mm audio input

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars122 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
